=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Jade Roller for Face, Jade Facial Roller, Gua Sha Scraping Massager, Anti-aging 100% Natural Facial Jade Stone Set - Face Eye Neck Beauty Roller For Slimming & Firming Review Date: 2015/12/24 Store: Tiny Captain Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '9 x 9 x 0.2 inches', 'Item model number': 'toullgo3uetyy5', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Batteries required': 'No', 'Item Weight': '0.32 ounces', 'Color': 'Blue', 'Brand': 'Tiny Captain', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9 x 9 x 0.2 inches', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof'} Review Text: I love these bibs! My son really needs these, he is one and a bit messy. He has lots of teeth coming in and lots of sisters who enjoy feeding him lots things. They go on easily with a small snap on the back and stay put. They come off easily and the material is great. It's beathable and I can throw them right in the washing machine. They come witha nice cloth bag that has a draw string so I can keep them together. Nice and easy just like it should be. My son looks adorable and I am very happy.
I purchased this product at a reduced price for an honest and unbiased review Review Title: I love these bibs Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Majestic Pure Moroccan Ghassoul Paste, Hammam Spa's Premium Quality Paste with Rose Water and Argan Oil, 8.8 Oz - Visibly Improves the Appearance of Your Skin Within Minutes YRMJK {'Brand': 'YRMJK', 'Item Form': 'Paste', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 2.7 x 2.6 inches; 8.8 Ounces'} This Morracan Ghassoul paste is awesome!! useing of Ghassoul Paste can improve skin tone, texture, elasticity, and clarity while eliminating dryness and flakiness. My skin looks and smells so much better, I smell like roses and I love it. The benefits of Ghassoul Paste are so great I make them into spa-quality masks for almost no money and in the convienince of my home.
The high concentration of natural minerals in Ghassoul Paste help replenish depleted minerals in your skin, resulting in a firmer, plumper, and more even-toned complexion. It can also be used as a scalp treatment to absorb oil, dirt, sebum and cleanse and clarify hair. No natural beauty tool kit should be without this fabulous Ghassoul Paste.
Moroccan Ghassoul, also known as Rhassoul Clay lessens dryness, enhances skin clarity and elasticity. It's known to clears pores, reduce stubborn blackheads and tighten skin resulting in a general smoothing of the surface skin. A lovely ochre colored clay with a silky smooth texture, mined in the Atlas Mountains of Morocco, this extraordinary mineral-rich clay is known for its unmatched ability to absorb impurities from the skin. It cleanses deep, clearing pores and tightening skin without harsh scrubs or chemicals.
I have been using this paste and see such wonderful results. I plan to use this for a long time to come, this is something that needs to be a staple in all of our homes. I am so happy with this.
I purchased this product for a reduced price to make an honest and unbiased review. This Morracan Ghassoul paste is awesome!! useing of Ghassoul Paste can improve skin ... Tweezers Set with Case | Slant, Straight and Pointed Tip Stainless Steel Tweezer OMAROA ["Trying to pull out a troublesome splinter?Tired of gluing your fingers together when applying fake eyelashes? Losing a screw from the hinge on your glasses? Scared of the massive ball of hair stuck in your shower drain? Sick of trying to thread needles with nearly-invisible thread? You need tweezers! Make difficult tasks easy with the right tools. Our Love It tweezers are perfect for grabbing, twisting, shaping and holding on to anything that's too delicate, small, fragile, or hard to grasp with your hands. These tweezers are built to last. Too often, tweezers are made with cheap material and careless manufacturing standards. This means that they quickly bend out of alignment and become useless. We don't want that to happen to you... which is why we build our tweezers out of stainless steel, machined carefully to come together in exactly the right position. A variety of tips for a variety of jobs. When you're handling anything small or fragile, the shape of your tweezers becomes extra important. That's why our Love It tweezer set ships with three different sizes of tool: standard, slanted, and extra-small. They're sharp, too-perfect for dislodging splinters or pulling that one annoying hair. And because they're sharp, we ship our Love It tweezers with a stylish leather carrying case, perfect for keeping them safe and protecting the other objects in your purse. No more squinting and fumbling when you try to do delicate jobs - order your set of Love It tweezers today!"] {'Brand': 'OMAROA', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3 x 0.1 x 0.3 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 0.1 x 0.3 inches; 0.1 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3179654', 'UPC': '646437258098', 'Manufacturer': 'OMAROA'} Tweezers!!!!
This is a great set of tweezers. Pink is my favorite color so right off the bat they get a plus for that. But seriously they work great. They are really sturdy and well made. Not those cheap ones that bend really easy. With three different pairs each with thier own unique job you can't go wrong. They have a nice sharp pinch at the end to grab the little hairs and get them gone. These tweezers are awesome they are great tweezers. I am so glad I was able to get these. This is an excellent set that I totally love.
I purchased this product for a reduced price for an honest and unbiased review. This is a great set of tweezers Organic Veda Moringa Turmeric Herbal Soap. Plant Based Vitamains and Minerals. Mild and Gentle Daily Care. I always try to source out all natural wholesome products for my family and I am so glad I was able to find this one. Turmeric is one of my favorite supplements to use for my health and my skin. It is free from harsh detergents, sulfates, additives, artificial colors and perfumes.
I am very impressed with the high quality and care that is taken into making this excellent soap. My skin feels softer and smoother and my dry skin is so nourished and soft now. It was a very nice experience that left my skin feeling soft and smooth and smelling lovely.
This is a Excellent soap that is full of all healthy natural ingredients. I am very pleased with the quality of this product. I am very pleased with my skin and how it feels from using this product as well. It is wrapped is a great wrapper that makes it unique and decorative.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Skin Care Enthusiast**: The user prioritizes skincare, focusing on products that enhance skin tone, texture, elasticity, and clarity while integrating various beauty needs.
- **Natural Ingredients**: They favor natural and herbal-based formulations from health-conscious brands, reinforcing their commitment to anti-aging products.
- **Home Spa Experience**: They enjoy DIY spa treatments, valuing cost-effective, nurturing solutions, and have a growing interest in tools that combat specific concerns, such as puffiness.
- **Fragrance Preference**: Initially favoring rose scents, they have expanded to enjoy lavender and turmeric fragrances, reflecting a love for pleasant, natural aromas.
- **Holistic Approach**: They lean towards multifunctional products that cater to both skin and body care, aligning with their integrated beauty regimen.
- **Positive Outcomes**: The user seeks effective, visible results, underscoring their commitment to wellness and efficacy.
- **Family-Oriented**: They prioritize safe formulations suitable for all family members, creating a wholesome environment with their choices.
- **Long-Term Commitment**: They express loyalty to brands that deliver positive experiences and aim for a sustainable skincare routine.
- **Quality Enthusiast**: Their recent interest in precision beauty tools demonstrates a continued appreciation for well-crafted, effective items that enhance their self-care and bathing experience.
- **Practicality and Ease**: The user values products that are easy to use and maintain, seeking convenient solutions that fit seamlessly into their family lifestyle.

They embrace multifunctional solutions that provide luxurious, spa-like experiences while ensuring safety for all family members.
